sentences.sContent: It’s astonishing that these criminals are free to walk the streets with impunity.
sentences.sCn: 令人惊讶的是，这些罪犯可以招摇过市却依然逍遥法外。

remMethod.val: im(不) + pun(惩罚) + ity → 免受惩罚

trans.tranOther: if someone does something bad with impunity, there is no risk that they will be punished for it
